publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1279# Gordon Jackson: Epilepsy Awareness-That the Parliament joins Epilepsy Scotland in marking National Epilepsy Awareness Week; recognises the need for greater education training in epilepsy awareness; considers that the Scottish Executive should encourage all public bodies to make such training a priority, and congratulates Epilepsy Scotland and related organisations for their 50 years' work to bring epilepsy "out of the darkness". Supported by: Donald Gorrie*

S2M-1279# Gordon Jackson: Epilepsy Awareness-That the Parliament joins Epilepsy Scotland in marking National Epilepsy Awareness Week; recognises the need for greater education training in epilepsy awareness; considers that the Scottish Executive should encourage all public bodies to make such training a priority, and congratulates Epilepsy Scotland and related organisations for their 50 years' work to bring epilepsy "out of the darkness". Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Shiona Baird*, Christine May*, Fergus Ewing*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Linda Fabiani*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Christine Grahame*, Robin Harper*, Rob Gibson*, Karen Gillon*, Tommy Sheridan*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Elaine Smith*, Rosie Kane*

S2M-1279# Epilepsy Awareness (lodged on 6 May 2004) Jackie Baillie*, Robert Brown*, Mr David Davidson*, Susan Deacon*, Phil Gallie*, Margaret Jamieson*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Eleanor Scott*, Murray Tosh*, Dr Elaine Murray*

S2M-1279# Epilepsy Awareness (lodged on 6 May 2004) Bristow Muldoon*, Ms Sandra White*, John Swinburne*, Janis Hughes*, Marlyn Glen*, Bill Aitken*, Frances Curran*, Des McNulty*, Mike Pringle*, Carolyn Leckie*
S2M-1279# Epilepsy Awareness (lodged on 6 May 2004) Alex Fergusson*, Dr Jean Turner*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Irene Oldfather*, Rhona Brankin*, Karen Whitefield*, Dr Sylvia Jackson*
S2M-1279# Epilepsy Awareness (lodged on 6 May 2004) Scott Barrie*, Brian Adam*, Trish Godman*
S2M-1279# Epilepsy Awareness (lodged on 6 May 2004) Pauline McNeill*, Dennis Canavan*
S2M-1279# Epilepsy Awareness (lodged on 6 May 2004) Helen Eadie*, Alasdair Morgan*
S2M-1279# Epilepsy Awareness (lodged on 6 May 2004) Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*
S2M-1279# Epilepsy Awareness (lodged on 6 May 2004) Mark Ballard*
S2M-1279# Epilepsy Awareness (lodged on 6 May 2004) Cathy Peattie*
